EmailTemplate.name: DRT Package Out Of Sync
EmailTemplate.subject: DRT {!DRT__c.Name} Out of Sync
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear TEAM,
DRT {!DRT__c.Name} is Out of Sync.
For details please see the link below: {!DRT__c.Link}
Thank you.
This is a system generated message, please do not reply. Best Regards.
